title: How To Record Calls on iPhone or Android (5 Ways)
tags: The Best Ways To Record Phone Calls on Android and iOS
Record Phone Calls using Google Voice
Record Phone Calls using 3-way calling services like Recordator.
Record Phone Calls using Inline Recording Device
description:
http://techwiser.com/record-calls-on-iphone-or-android/
Okay, So here are all the possible ways to record to your phone calls on android and iOS.

Video Content

1. Record Phone Calls using Google Voice 
2. Record Phone Calls using Inline Recording Device
3. Record Phone Calls using 3-way calling services like Recordator.
4. Using apps - call recorder ACR for iPhone use - TapeaCall
5. Record VoIP call like Whatsapp and skype.
